body: So is she going to keep doing that kind of work with the other guys? Author, if you want to make a netorare just do it right from the start.
It's not like she'll have sex you dumbshits, she can just do her job like before
So the girl will continue to work there? Wow, what a shitty ending! Completely ruined.

Lame ending having her still there. Imo would've been more interesting if low key harem or just normal wholesome end. Makes the whole she "loves" him assertion come across as just a shitty plot device that didn't mean anything.
Amazing art but the end , the end was bad , it doesn't feel ok
i mean art is nice. dude fking all of them was nice too. that ass was cool :^). only legit downside is that NTR feel to the ending lul
must be feels so damn good to cum in those ass
hope the mc will find a job soon cause her gf is gonna "work extra hard" then ntr route
This 3 chapter series was pretty hot. Would have been nice to see the parts when they were with the trainees and the threesome in chapter 2.
